text_raw:
3. The 14th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following

title: Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.
heading: 4. The 15th day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
4. The 15th day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 

provisions of the Act of 2024 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 33; 

(b) 

section 34. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 June, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th June, 2024.
